net.sf.hajdbc.sql.pool

Class ConnectionPoolDataSourceDatabase

  • java.lang.Object

        • net.sf.hajdbc.sql.pool.ConnectionPoolDataSourceDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Database<ConnectionPoolDataSource>>, Database<ConnectionPoolDataSource>

    @MBean
@Description(value="Database accessed via a server-side ConnectionPoolDataSource")
public class ConnectionPoolDataSourceDatabase
extends CommonDataSourceDatabase<ConnectionPoolDataSource>
    A database described by a ConnectionPoolDataSource.

    Paul Ferraro
